title: Learnpress Version [[version]] Now Available (Release version maybe publish on 05 December, 2022 )
description:
This version of the LearnPress software is under development. Please do not install, run, or test this version of LearnPress on production or mission-critical websites. Instead, it is recommended that you test Beta version on a test server and site.
Direct download [[link_download]].

Keep WordPress bug-free â€“ help with testing
If you see this notification, you can help us by downloading and testing this beta version on your testing websites. If you find any issues, feel free to send us the issue code, image and anything related. Contact us via: [[link_feedback]]

Your feedbacks help us to find and fix issues before releasing the official version.
[[link_changelog]]
